alert.note: Alert for Logan County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 23 at 6:49PM MDT until June 26 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Logan County. * WHEN...Until 1 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Area creeks and streams are running high and could flood with more heavy rain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Strong to severe storms are forecast to develop this evening and will produce heavy rainfall. Given the ongoing flooding and wet soil, this heavy rain could lead to additional flooding.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
